resources.string: Surdu\'s CM11\nproperties and boot service setup
The purpose of this little app is to set ROM-specific properties by executing several \"setprop\" commands for you\n\nwritten by xdaid
Extended Storage\nthese settings take effect after reboot
Gloves Mode\nthese settings take effect immediately
make your choice permanent\nre-apply profile on boot
LockScreen Rotation\nthese settings take effect immediately
make your choice permanent\nre-apply profile on boot
